aboutUs.title: About Me
aboutUs.text_content: Talented programmer currently working in Sydney.  A good listener with excellent communication skills, want to work in a creative and collaborative team. A hard worker, a quick learner, a critical problem solver and a passionate programmer with solid and in depth OO programming skills. A full stack developer familiar with various technologies, from backend to frontend, such as .NET, MVC, JavaScript(Angular/React/NodeJs), Web API, Web Service, HTML/CSS, or relational databases (PostgreSQL, MySQL, or SQL Server etc.).
